channel.title: The Genesys and Google Partnership on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in The Genesys and Google Partnership on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Intro to Google CCAI
item.description: CCAI stands for Contact Center Artificial Intelligence and it has three main components; Virtual Agent, Agent Assist, and Insights. Genesys integrates with Virtual Agent and with Agent Assist. Now that does not mean that Insights is not useful if a business is integrating Virtual Agent and Agent Assist with Genesys. We’ll get more into that a little bit more down the page. For now, let’s talk a bit more in depth about each of these three components.
